translations: 有丘疹的；多粉刺的（等于 pimply）

sentences.sentence: Minds, like bodies, will often fall into a pimpled, ill-conditioned state from mere excess of comfort.
sentences.translation: 思想和身体一样，过于舒适就会经常长粉刺。

sentences.sentence: Minds, like bodies, will often fall into a pimpled, ill-conditioned state from mere excess of comfort. ----Charles Dickens, author(1812-1870).
sentences.translation: 思想和身体一样，过于舒适就会经常长粉刺。----查尔斯。狄更斯，作家。
